subject: World Baseball Classic
Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ Johan Santana, kept from the World Baseball Classic due to injury, would have preferred to play for his native Venezuela over the weekend, its 10-2 loss to South Korea notwithstanding.
snippet: The Mets’ Johan Santana, kept from the World Baseball Classic due to injury, would have preferred to play for his native Venezuela over the weekend, its 10-2 loss to South Korea notwithstanding.
